title: The Vincent Boys Collection
description: Get the complete Vincent package with this boxed set that has double the sexiness and seduction. Sawyer Vincent is the golden boy. The football star. The straight-A student with the perfect girlfriend to match. His cousin Beau Vincent is the opposite. The bad boy. The rebel. Super sexy—and super dangerous. This boxed set of The Vincent Boys and The Vincent Brothers chronicles a breathless and sultry summer when everything changes—and the consequences that no one saw coming.
author: Abbi Glines
